description: This file defines REST API routes for monitoring, including log/metric ingestion, alert management, and dashboard data retrieval, using Express.js. It also contains Swagger documentation annotations.

methods.name: router.post('/logs')
methods.description: Handles POST requests to /logs endpoint for log ingestion, requiring 'operator' role, invoking ingestController.postLog.

methods.name: router.post('/metrics')
methods.description: Handles POST requests to /metrics endpoint for metric ingestion, requiring 'operator' role, invoking ingestController.postMetric.

methods.name: router.get('/alerts')
methods.description: Handles GET requests to /alerts endpoint to list alerts, requiring 'analyst' role, invoking alertsController.getAlerts.

methods.name: router.post('/alerts')
methods.description: Handles POST requests to /alerts endpoint to create alerts, requiring 'operator' role, invoking alertsController.postAlert.

methods.name: router.get('/alerts/rules')
methods.description: Handles GET requests to /alerts/rules to list alert rules, requiring 'analyst' role, invoking alertsController.getRules.

methods.name: router.post('/alerts/rules')
methods.description: Handles POST requests to /alerts/rules to create or update alert rules, requiring 'admin' role, invoking alertsController.upsertRule.

methods.name: router.get('/dashboard')
methods.description: Handles GET requests to /dashboard to retrieve dashboard data, requiring 'analyst' role, invoking dashboardController.getDashboard.
